title: A London Drug Dealer: Episode 104
description: Dealing class A drugs on the streets on north-west London is a profession fraught with danger.  Sure, the rewards can be great but the risks are huge and ever-present.  The UK True Crime Weekly podcast today looks at what happened in Kilburn in 2010, when one drug dealer was visited by a rival gang.  Warning: scenes of graphic violence.
